div.p: SUMMER. BUT WE HAVE TRYING TO HIT
EVERYWHERE IN THE COUNTRY. TIP OF THE DAY, WORST THING YOU
CAN DO THIS SUMMER IS NOTHING. IF YOU ARE A LAZY SACK OF COAL,
NUMBER ONE, GET A PHYSICAL THIS SUMMER.
ESPECIALLY IF YOU’RE OVER 40. BOOK YOUR DOCTOR.
GET IN THERE. TWO, READ AT LEAST THREE GOOD
BOOKS. AND NEXT WEEK I’LL HAVE
RECOMMENDATIONS FOR YOU. THREE, GET IN THE WATER.
EVEN IF YOU CAN’T SWIM, WADE. SWIMMING IN THE SUMMER GETTING
IN THE WATER IS GOOD FOR THE SOUL.
ESPECIALLY IN THE OCEAN. NUMBER FOUR, SEE YOUR COUNTRY.
AS YOU KNOW I’M DOING A BOLDER FRESHER TOUR WITH DENNIS JULY
25th. I’M GOING TO VISIT MOUNT RUSH
MOR. NEXT NIGHT IN FAR GO I’LL ROAM
AROUND THERE. BACK TO TIP OF THE COUNTRY.
SUMMER IS GOING TO WHIZ BY. THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
TALKING ABOUT WHIZZING BY, THIS PROGRAM WENT BY FAST I THINK.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS WEBSITE.
